item.title: About
item.description:
Hi there! I’m Sanjay.

I grew up in Lake Charles, Louisiana, studied at Stanford, and now work on the product team at Benchling, where I spend most of my time on data products. Previously I was at Palantir, where I focused on healthcare and bio customers, but touched a few other industries, including oil & gas, insurance, and shipping.

I have some experience in data, mechanical engineering, medicine, biophysics, molecular biology, and computer science. I tend to pick up little hobbies (acoustic guitar, stand-up comedy) and put them down again. In person I’m a big jokester, and love to laugh. Over zoom I do my best robot impression.

I now live in San Francisco, CA. I look like this:
